name: To All the Wolves I've Slain
name_original: To All the Wolves I've Slain
description:
A game made for the third annual Spooktober Jam host by Devtalk+

Features:

- ~5k words
- 2 unique endings
- Full voice acting!

Content Warning:

This game contains references to drugs, jump scares, mild harassment, and references to sexual promiscuity.

No actual werewolves were harmed in the making of this game ☺

 Thanks for playing and we hope you have a Happy Halloween!
